attributes.action: Lift existing partial lockdowns and rule out a second national lockdown
attributes.additional_details: There is no guarantee that people would abide by such restrictions. Small businesses are being squeezed by a gradual erosion of their ability to function and are close to running at a loss. The economic damage would be catastrophic.
attributes.background: The Government should end partial lockdowns in areas of the country such as Bolton and Newcastle, as well as ruling out a second national lockdown. Efforts should instead be focused on disseminating relevant material about the virus, and support systems to protect the vulnerable.
